subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Antti Raanta made 26 saves in his first N.H.L. shutout and Brandon Saad scored as the host Chicago Blackhawks beat Los Angeles, 1-0.
snippet: Antti Raanta made 26 saves in his first N.H.L. shutout and Brandon Saad scored as the host Chicago Blackhawks beat Los Angeles, 1-0.
